groupName.description: EPL Estatements GroupName. Should be 'Connect Online Banking'

identifier.description: EPL Estatements Identifier. This is how their system knows who is making the request.

privateKey.description: EPL Estatements Private Key. This is the key they use to encrypt requests.

encryptionInitializationVector.description: EPL Estatements Encryption initialization vector (Encryption IV). This is the Initialization Vector used to encrypt requests.
